title: This IS America, White Supremacy Doorbuster 1.8.21
itunes:title: This IS America, White Supremacy Doorbuster 1.8.21
description:
In episode 787, Jack and Miles are joined by Ethnically Ambiguous co-host Shereen Younes to discuss the domestic white terrorists taking over the capital, the aftermath, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. US Allies Call for Calm in D.C. as Mob Storms Capitol
  2. Rioters breached US Capitol security on Wednesday. This was the police response when it was Black protesters on DC streets last year
  3. Matt Gaetz is a tool. 
  4. Official describes the president as a 'total monster' who refused to act as Congress was stormed
  5. Aides weigh resignations, removal options as Trump rages against perceived betrayals
  6. WATCH: The Blues - Off The Porch

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
